statements: DELETE FROM data_retention_policy WHERE policy_name = 'Old Policy';
DELETE FROM data_retention_policy WHERE id = 1 AND retention_period > 365;
DELETE FROM data_retention_policy WHERE policy_name = 'Long Term' OR retention_period < 30;
DELETE FROM policy_logs WHERE timestamp < '2021-01-01' AND action = 'delete'
DELETE FROM policy_requirements WHERE policy_id = 1 AND requirement_id = 3;
DELETE FROM data_to_retain WHERE retention_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM data_to_retain WHERE retention_status = False;
